programme.title: Машины сказки
programme.desc: Маша рассказывает своим игрушкам известные сказки народов мира в неповторимой детской манере — путая сюжеты и героев и завершая каждую историю неожиданным и остроумным выводом.

programme.title: Приключения на волшебном острове
programme.desc: Прекрасная девочка Океана живет на райском острове вместе со своим дедушкой наставником. Другие дети постоянно дразнят ее за то, что у нее нет родителей. Из-за этого Океане становится грустно и одиноко, но она постепенно учится быть сильной и независимой. В этом ей помогает ее ум и хорошее чувство юмора. Океана не подозревает о своем прошлом, в котором была добрая фея, пираты и злой колдун. Ее мир переворачивается с ног на голову, когда колдун находит на дне океана магический кристальный шар. С его помощью колдун хочет захватить остров, и только Океана может его остановить. Герои этого мультфильма перенесут Вас в волшебный мир и с каждым новым эпизодом вы погрузитесь в атмосферу увлекательных приключений и веселых историй.

programme.title: Как львенок и черепашка пели песню
programme.desc: Черепаха сочинила песню, а Львенок выучил ее, и они стали петь вместе.

programme.title: Сестрица Алёнушка и братец Иванушка
programme.desc: По мотивам русской народной сказки. Не послушался Иванушка своей сестрицы, испил водицы из лужицы, в которой копытце отпечаталось, и превратился в козленочка…

programme.title: Малыши Юрского периода
programme.desc: Интересный и насыщенный красками мультипликационный сериал. Компания из нескольких маленьких динозавров потерялась и теперь путешествует по временным пространствам на волшебном черном метеорите, который когда-то упал на землю. Они ищут своих родителей и готовы совершать любые поступки, лишь бы отыскать их. Эпохи меняются, динозаврики постоянно попадают в различные интересные приключения. Единственная мечта маленьких героев – обрести настоящую семью. Поможет ли им метеорит осуществить такое заветное желание. Если есть сила и невероятное желание – возможно все. Ни смена времен и эпох, ни природные катаклизмы не помешают динозаврикам обрести семью. Мультсериал очень легкий и непринужденно воспринимается зрителями. Отлично подходит для проведения досуга в семейном кругу. В восторге будут и маленькие зрители и их родители.

programme.title: Машины сказки
programme.desc: Маша рассказывает своим игрушкам известные сказки народов мира в неповторимой детской манере — путая сюжеты и героев и завершая каждую историю неожиданным и остроумным выводом.

programme.title: Приключения Жюля Верна
programme.desc: Герои через жерло вулкана проникают к центру Земли, где их ждет удивительный мир, населенный чудом сохранившимися доисторическими животными и растениями. Сюжет построен на основе романа Жюля Верна.

programme.title: Приключения Тимми
programme.desc: "Маленький барашек Тимми, вместе со своими юными друзьями с фермы, отлично проводит время в детском саду, под надзором доброй цапли Гарриет и мудрого Филина Осборна. Там он учится многим хорошим вещам, в том числе и хорошему поведению. Немного упрямый и озорной Тимми может иногда напроказничать, но воспитатели всегда укажут ему на его ошибки и Тимми больше никогда не будет их повторять. О похождениях этого сорванца и будет идти речь в данном мультфильме."

programme.title: Personība. 100 g kultūras. Pianists Sergejs Osokins
Personība. 100 g kultūras. Komponists un pianists Kārlis Lācis

Latin American Hot Borders
programme.desc: Latin American Hot Borders is a documentary series on National Geographic that follows stressful and tough working days of Customs officers. The borders in Latin America separate one country from another and at the same time legal from illegal as well. The viewers will witness a battle against the crime that goes to the extreme. Latin America is in the front line in a war against human trafficking, drugs, weapons and alcohol smuggling, money laundry, illegal immigration. In case this war is lost, the consequences can be terrible for many people.

programme.title: The Border
programme.desc: Documentary series. National Geographic takes you on the front line of the USA's border control. Featuring various divisions of the United States Department of Homeland Security including ICE (Immigration and Customs Enforcement) and Customs and Border Protection. We see how the professionals attempt to uphold the USA's immigration laws on the border and at other points of entry. Follow the Marine and Air Interdiction Agents, who patrol the Mexico–United States border; the most frequently crossed border in the world. Every day is a battle to stop illegal drugs, illegally imported goods, terrorists and other dangers from entering the country.

programme.title: Breakout
programme.desc: Sent to Parkhurst Prison, for arson and conspiring to cause explosions, Matthew Williams was determined to escape, but knew it was going to be difficult. Parkhurst was not only surrounded by multiple fences-- it was on an island. Even if he got out of the prison he'd have to find a way to get off the island. But Matthew is determined. He teams up with other prisoners and makes a key that can open many of the prison doors. They also assemble a ladder in the metal workshop, keeping it in pieces to make it less conspicuous. They make it out, but getting off the island is much trickier. Their plan to steal a plane fails and, after hiding out for a few days, they head to the coast to try to steal a boat, but will that be the end of the line?

programme.title: Nazi Megastructures
programme.desc: In his quest for world domination, Hitler demanded some of the biggest and deadliest pieces of military hardware in history. In this series, the shock and awe tactics of the Blitzkrieg, the unparalleled fortifications on The Channel Islands and the Fuhrer's Megasub – a silent killing machine that had the potential to win the war for the Nazis – are all explored. Evidence of these terror weapons and incredible defensive structures are spread across Europe, if you know where to look. Nazi Mega Structures follows a team of experts on a dark journey of exploration through Europe's mountains, forests and industrial heartland to uncover a Nazi world that has been hidden for decades. Using drama reconstructions, carefully crafted CGI and rarely seen archive, each episode also unravels the personal stories of the men who designed, built and operated Hitler's terrifying mega weapons.

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: This American anthology period drama series is designed so that in each season the audience is introduced to a different iconic person who made a huge impact to the world and follows their life stories. The first season follows turbulent journey of the physicist who would grow to become the icon- Albert Einstein. Second season returns to explore the turbulent life of the 20th century's most controversial artist, Pablo Picasso and the subject of the third season will be American singer Aretha Franklin, known as "The Queen of Soul". This amazing series will change the way we see this incredible people, portrayed by famous actors, as we follow them through childhood to great discoveries, epic loves, complicated relationships, causes and their flaws.

programme.title: Atlas of Cursed Places
programme.desc: Everybody has heard about Dracula, a blood-thirsty monster who invokes immortality with a bite on the neck. But many believe the real Dracula was a 15th century eastern European ruler with a penchant for impaling enemies, Vlad Tepes, whose curse upon his homeland has lasted for six centuries. With the help of emerging science in the field of genetics, Sam investigates the curse of Vlad the Impaler.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Diaries
programme.desc: The crew of the Costa Serena is facing another nail-biting week: a famous band, Nomadi will perform a rock concert in the theatre and security must deal with paparazzi, difficult fans and celebrities. Demanding German guests are in search of peace and quiet and the entertainment team is working double shifts to keep everyone happy.

programme.title: Construction Zone
programme.desc: The Itaipu Dam is the world's largest hydroelectric power plant and a triumph of giant-scale engineering. Find out how engineers and over forty thousand Brazilian and Paraguayan workers toiled around the clock to create this immense structure. Follow the story as they lay millions of tons of concrete, divert the course of the world's 7th largest river, and relocate thousands of people and animals in order to bring power to millions of people in two countries while overcoming impossible odds and breaking construction and engineering records.

programme.title: Construction Zone
programme.desc: The Kansai Airport in Japan is considered to be one of the great engineering achievements in the world, second only to the Panama Canal. It is a "State-of-the-Art" facility that handles over a million passengers a week. It has all the operational problems of a normal International Airport, but on top of that it has to contend with typhoons, earthquakes and to top it all off¿ it's sinking! We will go behind the scenes to figure out how this feat of engineering works

programme.title: Filthy Riches
programme.desc: In Filthy Riches, travel across America to find industrious and ingenious people who prove they're not afraid to roll up their sleeves and get their hands dirty. Whether catching eels on the Delaware River, hunting ginseng in Appalachia, digging for bloodworms in the mudflats of Maine, harvesting wood burls in the west, or scouring forests for edible mushrooms, one thing is constant: these mavericks must rely on their own strength and determination to forge a living.

programme.title: Engineering Connections
programme.desc: Richard Hammond reveals the engineering inspirations behind the tallest road bridge in the world – the Millau Viaduct, in France. He fires three quarters of a million volts from his finger tips to see how the power of lightning cut the steel structure quickly and accurately. The huge piers – 340 metres high, and which would look down on the Eiffel Tower – were positioned to millimetre accuracy with the system that located lost nuclear submarines. The longest road-deck in the world was launched along the top of the piers – and required the slipperiest substance known to man – Teflon; not even a gecko can stick to it. Steel cables hold the bridge in shape – born of a series of mining accidents. And to allow the bridge to expand a metre and a half in the summer sun the engineers turned to an ancient Celtic boat-building technique which can make concrete as bendy as wood.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz have taken on their smallest ever car and one of their biggest jobs, a 1958 Messerschmitt KR200 bubble car. The car's owner is 23 year old graphic designer Sam, he bought the car with his dad as a joint restoration project but when Sam was struck with a serious heart condition their plans were scuppered. Now, with Sam is still dealing with the consequences of his heart problems the Car SOS boys have stepped in to save this tiny Messerschmitt bubble car and help put a smile back on its owners face.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz head to the South coast and Eastbourne on a quest to secretly restore a 1962 Mini Cooper S. This particular model is the property of farmer Keith who has raced and rallied cars for most of his life, until he was struck down with serious heart problems. Although his racing days are now over Keith can't let go of his beloved Mini Cooper, even though it's rotting away in a shed. Once the boys steal the car away and get it back to the workshop they soon discover this is no ordinary car, but in fact has a full racing engine, albeit catastrophically seized. The decision to not just restore Keith's car but transform it into a Monte Carlo winning replica is controversial. Will Keith approve when his car is eventually unveiled?

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: North vs. South
programme.desc: When a new fleet of Southern boats arrive in the Outer Banks, the Gloucester crews face their stiffest competition yet. The new contenders include a bug exterminator-turned captain, a young rookie team in a tiny fishing console, an old familiar face with a new boat and a fishing family on a slow but dangerous vessel. The Northern and Southern crews battle it out, bluefin-for-bluefin, on the treacherous seas of the Outer Banks until a new and surprising victor emerges.

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: This American anthology period drama series is designed so that in each season the audience is introduced to a different iconic person who made a huge impact to the world and follows their life stories. The first season follows turbulent journey of the physicist who would grow to become the icon- Albert Einstein. Second season returns to explore the turbulent life of the 20th century's most controversial artist, Pablo Picasso and the subject of the third season will be American singer Aretha Franklin, known as "The Queen of Soul". This amazing series will change the way we see this incredible people, portrayed by famous actors, as we follow them through childhood to great discoveries, epic loves, complicated relationships, causes and their flaws.

programme.title: King Fishers
programme.desc: Three anglers from opposite corners of the globe come together to prove they are the best, both at home and abroad. Wes from Scotland, Guy from Botswana and Mark from Mauritius go head to head as they battle for some of the worlds most notorious catches, including the legendary Tiger Fish, the mighty Blue Marlin and the notorious Atlantic Salmon. The banter is tough, the fishing tougher but as tempers rise between Guy and Wes, will they all keep their cool when it comes down to clinching the competition?

programme.title: Zeb's Big Fish
programme.desc: Aquatic ecologist Dr Zeb Hogan is on a mission in the Indian Himalayas to investigate disturbing reports of a mammoth sized catfish called a Goonch – accused of stalking, attacking and killing people. (This is OK- I've seen this elsewhere, but any Discovery site is not good.) Zeb enlists the help of local guide and conservationist Vinay Badola, and together they head out to investigate the crime scenes along the Kali River. They'll raft through treacherous white water in an area known by locals as 'the Lost Country', where they meet with eye witnesses who give them detailed accounts of the attacks. Zeb then travels to the Ramganga River, the perfect place to spot and catch some Goonch. Commercial fishing is not allowed here so this river could be harbouring some giant fish. (Also- needs a source) His goal is to catch the Goonch and study its behaviour to determine whether these stories are fact or fiction.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: Zara Whittaker, from a poverty-ridden housing project in South London, left behind her 8 month old baby, to go to Barbados and smuggle cocaine back. She never thought anything could go wrong – her partner in crime had done it 12 times before. Three days before the run, she found out she was pregnant, but she'd already spent too much of the drug dealers' money to pull out. Stopped by the police at the airport, Zara was given a five year prison sentence – she gave birth in Barbados, and, after three heartbreaking months, had to give the baby up.

programme.title: Banged Up Abroad
programme.desc: Banged Up Abroad is a British docudrama television series following stories of people who have been arrested while travelling abroad. It seems like you are watching a blood-freezing thriller, except for it is based on real events and real people. You'll see how a trip to paradise can turn into hell and end up in prison in an unknown country and it will make your hair stand. People get into troubles for trying to smuggle drugs, sometimes they are kidnapped or captured. The series is a mixture of interviews with the real people and actors reconstructing the events. We find out what it is like to be in prison abroad, without help and money, not knowing the language, and what are the terrible consequences for the family members. The series is a warning for all careless tourists, it shows vividly how easy and fast it is to hit rock bottom.

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: This American anthology period drama series is designed so that in each season the audience is introduced to a different iconic person who made a huge impact to the world and follows their life stories. The first season follows turbulent journey of the physicist who would grow to become the icon- Albert Einstein. Second season returns to explore the turbulent life of the 20th century's most controversial artist, Pablo Picasso and the subject of the third season will be American singer Aretha Franklin, known as "The Queen of Soul". This amazing series will change the way we see this incredible people, portrayed by famous actors, as we follow them through childhood to great discoveries, epic loves, complicated relationships, causes and their flaws.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: A fascinating documentary series from National Geographic exploring Europe from above. Although only the second-smallest continent on our planet, Europe is packed full of diverse wildlife, cities, countries, politics and history. From this unique perspective, viewers can see the culturally rich continent like they never have before, with cameras in the sky offering a stunning examination of these beautiful lands. Each episode in this six-part series focusses on a respective country, with those explored in this series being the Netherlands, Italy, Germany, Spain, the United Kingdom and Poland. Narrated by Julian Barratt.

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: From raw materials to finished products, Food Factory goes behind the scenes to reveal how our favorite foods are produced: Made from just ten ingredients, this eco-minded breakfast cereal gives back to the iconic birds for which it is named; this historic Jacksonville building is home to one of America's largest candy shops where artisan chocolatiers turn liquid into luscious raspberry creams; drizzled with oil and a pinch of salt, nearly 10 million kilograms of New York style bagel crisps roll off this North Carolina assembly line every year; and, find out how this Illinois outfit mixes science and sunshine to create yellow food coloring.

programme.title: Food Factory
programme.desc: From raw materials to finished products, Food Factory goes behind the scenes to reveal how our favorite foods are produced: The recipe for these iconic cherry throat drops hasn't changed in over a century and nearly five million of them are produced every day; it took several months and dozens of tries to perfect the recipe for these gluten-free Southwest-style veggie pockets; no one at this Pennsylvania candy factory will reveal the top-secret ingredient in these melt-in-your-mouth peanut butter chocolates; and, in this open-air kitchen, fresh Ohio apples are transformed into cinnamon-scented apple butter in spinning copper kettles that are heated by a wood fire.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: In 1981, the Federal Aviation Administration established the sterile cockpit rule requiring pilots to refrain from non-essential activities during critical phases of flight. When this rule is broken, the resulting distraction can be deadly. Passengers fight for their lives inside a burning plane at Dallas Fort Worth Airport. A brand new L-1011 crashes in a remote swamp in the Florida Everglades. And, during a demonstration flight, a brand new Russian Superjet slams into a mountain south of Jakarta.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: With airplane travel becoming increasingly popular in a shrinking world and millions of passengers journeying this way every day, it is helpful to be aware of the potentail dangers involved. This show presents remarkable stories of some of the most catastrophic accidents in aviation history and investigates the causes of the accidents, what effect they had on the industry and the steps taken to ensure that they don't happen in the future. Each stand-alone episode features compelling re-enactments, expert analysis and interviews with those involved. The explanations for the accidents range from the explosive power of decompression to problems with autopilots and computerised control systems to air traffic control errors.

programme.title: Lost Cities with Albert Lin
programme.desc: Using cutting edge technology such as ground-penetrating radar, LiDar and 3D scanning, Albert Lin takes us on a journey of discovery to reveal the secrets and mysteries of various archaeological sites. Working alongside on-site archaeologists with expert knowledge of that specific area, Lin explores the hidden worlds and attempts to recreate them for the viewer. Episodes include travelling to Israel in search of the lost treasures of the enigmatic Knights Templar; adventuring in Colombia to look for the lost city of El Dorado; exploring in Micronesia to try to uncover the ancient island city of Nan Madol; and attempting to discover the mysteries behind the buidling of Stonehenge and the previous occupants who inhabited the site before the stones were raised.

programme.title: Lost Cities with Albert Lin
programme.desc: Using cutting edge technology such as ground-penetrating radar, LiDar and 3D scanning, Albert Lin takes us on a journey of discovery to reveal the secrets and mysteries of various archaeological sites. Latin America is in the front line in a war against human trafficking, drugs, weapons and alcohol smuggling, money laundry, illegal immigration. In case this war is lost, the consequences can be terrible for many people.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: School of Rock is an American musical-comedy television series based on the 2003 film of the same name. A group of teenagers of the prestigious american school have a pretty predictable life, until one day totally changes everything. Once they get a substitute teacher Dewey Finn and he instructs Tomika, Freddy, Summer, Zack and Lawrence in the art of rock and roll. Mr Finn has his own view on the lesson structure and he gets across to the students easily so they become his huge fans at once. Thanks to Mr Finn the teens create a rock band and learn to play different instruments. Rock helps them to realize that in order to become successful they must learn how to work as a team, merge into one and leave any signs of egoistic behavior behind.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Babe and Kenzie are two, 12-year-old girls who create a mobile game that becomes the most popular game of the year. With the profits and their friend, Hudson, world – famous Rapper Double G, and his son, Triple G, the girls start their own supercool gaming company in Brooklyn. Now, Babe and Kenzie must keep their gaming business a success while still managing to get good grades. The show experience spans multiple platforms as viewers not only watch the gang's adventures, but play their latest creations on Nick.com, the Nick App and their mobile devices.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea spong Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells about the ten year old boy Timmy that lives in the fictional town Dimmsdale where he has a hard time. His life is constantly miserable because his parents are rarely home, he is babysat by Vicky, a 16-year-old torturous babysitter, he is bullied daily, and is tormented by his teacher, Mr. Crocker. But everything changes when he receives two fairy godparents: Cosmo, his wife Wanda, and later their son, Poof. Timmy learns that his fairy godparents are capable of granting him any wish he wants within certain limits. However, Timmy's immature nature causes him to sometimes ask for wishes that unintentionally result in disaster.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Game Shakers revolves around two seventh graders, Babe and Kenzie, who live and go to school in Brooklyn, New York. Once they create a video game called "Sky Whale" as part of their school science project. The two friends have no idea that their game will become very popular and make a fortune. Everything goes smoothly until famous rapper Double G wants to sue them for illegal use of his song in the game. The girls decide to make an offer he can't refuse- business partnership, they also offer his son Triple G to become a video game consultant.

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You
programme.desc: It's a special nighttime game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to do for her first pajama party. While we play Blue's Clues we learn about why it gets dark and light outside and which animals prefer the nighttime.

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe
programme.desc: The owner of Butterbean's Cafe in the magical land of Puddlebrook is fairy Butterbean. Her cafe is a very comfortable and warm place, popular for its various dishes- cakes, pancakes, cookies, banana bread, salads cooked by herself, her friends Poppy, Dazzle, Jasper and her sister Poppy. Friends use extraordinary cooking appliances and a magic secret ingredient, that is why everything is so special and yummy. Their jealous rival is Ms. Marmalady, things are not going great at her cafe so she desperately wants to put Butterbean out of business. But true friendship and friends' support can conquer evil.

programme.title: Les barbapapa
programme.desc: Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family. Each 11 minute episode will take a lead from Michael Bond's original books and, with the spirit of the new Paddington movies, tell brand new Paddington stories in an exciting new animated form. The show will appeal to both children and adults alike – adults will recognise the Paddington they know and love, and young children will discover him for the first time. The show is heavily influenced by the Paddington Feature Films but a key difference is the characters especially the Brown family have been aged down, more of a young family starting out than the comfortable middle aged ones we see in the films.

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: PAW Patrol is a preschool series starring a pack of six heroic puppies: Chase, Marshall, Rocky, Zuma, Rubble, and Skye, who are led by a tech-savvy 10-year-old boy named Ryder. With a unique blend of problem-solving skills, cool vehicles and lots of cute doggy humor, the PAW Patrol works together on high-stakes rescue missions to protect the Adventure Bay community.From Marshall the firedog to Chase the police pup to Skye, who flies high in her copter, each pup brings unique personality and skill to the team, modeling the importance of teamwork and good citizenship. They all have special Pup Packs on their backs to help them handle anything – from rescuing kittens to saving a train from a rockslide! And no matter how big the adventure, the PAW Patrol always has time for a game, a laugh, and an ear scratch from Ryder.Fun PAW Patrol Fact: Ryder rescued all the pups and taught them their PAW Patrol skills.

programme.title: Paw Patrol

programme.title: 44 Cats
programme.desc: 44 Cats is an Italian preschool animated television series about four kittens who create a musical group called the Buffycats. Lampo is the lead singer and guitarist, Milady is the bassist, Pilou is the drummer and Meatball is the keyboard player. The kittens live in the house of Granny Pina where they meet 40 other cats. Granny likes to cook her magic pasta that gives the Buffycats their special powers. Her old garage is turned into a club, where the kittens give concerts and polish up their musical talents. They are always enthusiastic and optimistic, ready to give a helping hand to other cats and kittens. The 44 Cats is inspired by a very popular Italian kids song, 44 Cats which became famous on children's song festival Zecchino d'Oro in 1968.

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The series is an animated comedy about a single father named David Seville, who is raising three chipmunks. He can lose his patience sometimes, causing him to say ALVINNN!!! . The series takes place in modern times and discusses modern topics such as Dave's technology issues and school bullying. Others are parents embarrassing kids and parents needing dates.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Tired of doing favors to get a ride from Lori, Lincoln decides it's time to help Leni pass her driver's test. Lincoln conspires with the rest of his sisters to overthrow Lori's tyranny as their "baby"sitter.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This children's cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincoln's best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincoln's abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincoln's oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln has to get to school on time but getting his sisters out the door proves to be the biggest obstacle of all. Lincoln is the deciding vote on going to the beach or the amusement park for their family vacation.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures
programme.desc: Lego City Adventures is an American-Danish computer-animated TV series produced by The Lego Group. The series is set in the noisy sprawling LEGO City metropolis, where its down-to-earth characters live and work. Here you will meet the bravest firemen, the best policemen, the most attentive mayor and LEGO characters from all walks of life. They team up to stop a mysterious criminal, who causes troubles all around. Each LEGO City citizen can feel quite a hero and participate in the most amazing and unbelievable adventures in the city! If you find yourself there, you witness everyday incidents with a happy ending.

programme.title: SpongeBob Squarepants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest adventures.

Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max Thunderman are 14-year-old twins who share a house, a school, a birthday, and a set of superpowers courtesy of their super-powered parents. Yet somehow, in the cosmic game of genetic roulette, Phoebe popped out of the womb good, while Max came out evil. This super-sibling rivalry, coupled with the typical school/family issues faced by your average kid ultimately leads to a series of hilarious situations.

programme.title: Nicky, Ricky, Dicky & Dawn
programme.desc: Everyone with siblings knows that sibling rivalry is a real thing, so imagine the sibling rivalry between quadruplets. That's everyday life for the Harper quadruplets Nicky, Ricky, Dicky and Dawn.Whilst you might assume they get on well, these four siblings have absolutely nothing in common which normally leads to family fights. Although everyday life can be tough they have to learn to work together to solve the endless problems that they find themselves facing. Produced by Nickelodeon this lighthearted American comedy series is sure to have you fits of giggles.

programme.title: Game Shakers
programme.desc: Babe and Kenzie are two, 12-year-old girls who create a mobile game that becomes the most popular game of the year. With the profits and their friend, Hudson, world – famous Rapper Double G, and his son, Triple G, the girls start their own supercool gaming company in Brooklyn. Now, Babe and Kenzie must keep their gaming business a success while still managing to get good grades. The show experience spans multiple platforms as viewers not only watch the gang's adventures, but play their latest creations on Nick.com, the Nick App and their mobile devices.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Just Add Magic
programme.desc: In Part 1 of the season finale, Kelly finds a recipe that will save Grandma but the uncertainty around what its side effects are causes a rift between the friends. Kelly is grounded and Darbie must eat Walk-In-My-Shoes Schnitzel to impersonate her.

programme.title: Goldie's Oldies
programme.desc: 14 yr old Goldie's life is turned upside down when her family moves in with her Grandpa Maury and his three 70 something, totally bonkers housemates. Goldie's landed herself the ultimate insta-family!...If she can keep everyone together.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Entertaining comedy series that follows the out-of-this-world adventures of the Thundermans, a family that has superpowers but try to live normal lives in the town of Hiddenville. The parents, Hank and Barb, used to be "Thunder Man" and "Electress", until they decided to retire and move to suburbs, in an attempt to live a normal life with their kids- ''Thunder Twins'' Phoebe, whose superpowers include telekinesis, heat breath and freeze breath and Max, who has the same powers but wants to become a super-villain, Billy who is super fast, Nora, who has laser eyes and Chloe, whose superpower is teleportation.

programme.title: Aktuāli šodien un rīt
programme.desc: 6.epizode. Mazie un vidējie uzņēmumi – kāda ir to nākotne Latvijā? Raidījuma vadītāja Anda Pēkšēna, kurai ir 20 gadu vadības pieredze uzņēmējdarbībā, kopā ar dažādu nozaru ekspertiem un prasmju treneriem sniegs skaidru redzējumu mazo un vidējo uzņēmumu vadītājiem: kā saglabāt biznesu šodien, kā pastāvēt rīt, kā šodien ir jāmaina komunikācijas veids ar patērētāju, kā vadīt komandu, esošās izmaiņas nodokļu segmentā un citi svarīgi jautājumi, kas ir nozīmīgi ikvienam uzņēmējam.

Ikdienišķa maltīte kļūs par svētkiem, ja to pārvērtīsiet kopīgā grilēšanas pasākumā dārzā, piemājas terasē vai pie dabas krūts.

Raidījuma mērķis ir iedvesmot un uzrunāt ikvienu, kas vēlas uzlabot dzīves kvalitāti, mudinot uz rīcību.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Свет одновременно материален и нематериален. Вечность – главная особенность света. Фотонам не свойственно стареть. Свет от далеких звезд идет до Земли миллионы лет и приходит неизменным. Человек видит окружающие предметы исключительно благодаря фотонам. Проведенные исследования породили еще одну версию возникновение мира, согласно которой мир создан из света и может быть вновь обращен в свет. Об этом и многом другом расскажет Документальный проект.

programme.title: Шефы
programme.desc: Мини-сериал рассказывает о шеф-поваре знаменитого французского заведения, готовом пойти на всё ради спасения собственного ресторана. А также, о его отношениях с другими людьми, в полностью неполиткорректном мире…

programme.title: Улетное видео по-русски
programme.desc: Улетное видео по-русски – это сборник самых смешных и невероятных видео со всей планеты. В каждом выпуске представлены смешные падения людей, а также глупые поступки и нелепые ситуации в которые они попадают. Все серии улетного видео также не обошлись без обаятельных и неповторимых животных. Лучшее видео с любимыми котиками, смешным собаками и сотнями представителей дикой и домашней фауны, также собраны в одной передаче. Если смотреть улетное видео по-русски, то можно смело забыть о плохом настроении, ведь герои передачи заставят рассмеяться даже самого грустного зрителя. Все серии шоу пропитаны искрометным юмором, смешными шутками и невероятными кадрами. Помимо этого в шоу собраны редкие записи природных катаклизмов, сумасшедших везений и еще много-много все.

programme.title: Euronews
programme.desc: Свежие репортажи из разных уголков Европы помогут зрителям Первого канала ориентироваться в водовороте бурной европейской жизни

programme.title: Пападос-шоу
programme.desc: Юмористическая телепрограмма подарит телезрителям массу эмоций — от восторга до испуга. В каждом выпуске телешоу "Пападос шоу" собраны розыгрыши, снятые скрытой камерой в разных странах мира. Это нестандартные ситуации, вызывающие неожиданную реакцию прохожих. Камера фиксирует, как реагируют люди разного возраста на унитаз или душевую кабину в лифте, труп на улице или пленника в багажнике машины. Ведущие предлагают повторить пранки, а автор лучшего видео может получить приз от программы.

programme.title: Документальный проект
programme.desc: Свет одновременно материален и нематериален. Вечность – главная особенность света. Фотонам не свойственно стареть. Свет от далеких звезд идет до Земли миллионы лет и приходит неизменным. Человек видит окружающие предметы исключительно благодаря фотонам. Проведенные исследования породили еще одну версию возникновение мира, согласно которой мир создан из света и может быть вновь обращен в свет. Об этом и многом другом расскажет Документальный проект.

programme.title: Когда мы дома
programme.desc: Об эволюции семейных отношений – от начала совместной жизни и до старости. Главные герои – пять украинских семейных пар разного возраста и степени развития отношений, которые не знакомы между собой. События в комедийном сериале разворачиваются в стенах квартир, в которых проживают пары, и построены на коротких историях из семейной жизни.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Персонажами шоу становятся обычные врачи и больные, ГАИшники и нарушители, родители и дети, полицейские и хулиганы, пилоты и стюардессы, офисные работники и даже стриптизёрши.

programme.title: Реальная мистика
programme.desc: Огромному количеству людей приходилось сталкиваться с проявлением необъяснимого и сверхъестественного, однако в большинстве случаев найти рациональный ответ на произошедшую ситуацию не удавалось никому. Докудрама "Реальная мистика" ставит перед собой амбициозную задачу: разгадать, на первый взгляд, абсолютно загадочные и мистические явления. Герои "Реальной мистики" – простые зрители, столкнувшиеся с необъяснимым в своей жизни. Ведущий документального реалити актер Андрей Дебрин вместе с командой помощников будет проводить расследование самых запутанных историй, которые происходят в мире: НЛО, гадания, привороты, аномальные зоны и многим другим и выяснят, что на самом деле за ними стоит.

programme.title: Гроздья винограда
programme.desc: Это история любви и дружбы, которая начинается в 1953 году и продолжается 30 лет. Она происходит на фоне истории страны, перипетий колхоза, выращивающего виноград, и жизни донской казачьей станицы. Правительство, обеспокоенное процветанием в стране алкоголизма, решает ввести "сухой закон". Но даже этого им кажется ничтожно мало. И тогда верховная власть постановляет: вырубить виноградные плантации, чтобы свести к минимуму производство спиртной продукции. Уничтожаются виноградники, из-за чего страдает не только природа, но и люди. Казаки, которые существовали за счет выращивания фруктов и виноделия, решают противостоять власти и бороться за любимое дело всеми возможными способами.

programme.title: След
programme.desc: Действие сериала разворачивается в Москве вокруг новой экспериментальной лаборатории. Она оснащена по последнему слову техники, но есть всего шесть человек способных работать с новейшими технологическими разработками. Сотрудники лаборатории — это персонал Федеральной Экспертной Службы. ФЭС – это суперкоманда нашего времени, лучшие кадры всех областей криминалистики. Исследуя различные улики, генерируя версии, изобличая преступников, они помогают следствию в раскрытии реальных уголовных преступлений. Первостепенная задача ФЭС – найти то, что не смогут другие, их интерес – материальный мир места преступления. Миллиметр за миллиметром они исследуют каждую улику, ничто не останется незамеченным.

programme.title: Онлайн
programme.desc: Типичную "блондинку" Лену в жизни устраивает абсолютно все: муж, находящийся на заработках в Португалии, все также позволяет тратить ей деньги и уже перестал пытаться тщетно ее контролировать и дал полную свободу действий. Поэтому, не теряя возможностей, все время Лена проводит с пользой и "по-максимуму" — тратит еще больше денег, смотрит еще больше видео, постит еще больше постов, френдит еще больше людей в соц.сетях и еще больше веселит зрителя, так как комичных ситуаций в ее жизни только прибавляется. Бедный ее муж Витя!

programme.title: Инспектор Купер
programme.desc: В Арсенале, одном из промышленных районов российской глубинки, живет Алексей Куприянов по прозвищу Купер. Его жизнь меняется после убийства друга — чтобы вести собственное расследование, и капитан Куприянов уходит из оперативного отдела, и становится участковым инспектором. В Арсенале все ему свое, родное: и бывшая жена со своими проблемами, и сын в переходном возрасте, и девушки-красавицы, и местные жители, которые обращаются к нему за помощью, и даже бандиты, терроризирующие городок. Но Купер не из робких, и точно знает, как со всем этим справиться…

programme.title: Морские дьяволы. Смерч
programme.desc: Их называют "морскими дьяволами", хотя по праву их можно считать рыцарями трех стихий: они действуют на земле, в воде и в воздухе. Захватывающий боевик "Морские дьяволы" посвящен спецназовцам ВМФ России, всем боевым пловцам — тем, кто является элитой наших вооруженных сил. Все имена и боевые псевдонимы в сериале вымышлены, отряд под таким названием никогда не существовал, но такие подразделения существуют на самом деле, и их подвигами страна вправе гордиться!

programme.title: Морские дьяволы. Северные рубежи
programme.desc: Продолжение популярной многосерийной франшизы "Морские дьяволы" в актуализированном виде – спецподразделение выполняет непростые задачи в суровых условиях на северной границе России. Официально, спецподразделение теперь называется – "Нерпы". Сама группа набирается из профессионалов возрастом около 35-ти лет. Батя, Багира и Бизон выполняют в сериале командно-тактические функции, хотя иногда и оказываются на острие действия. Офицеры группы спецназа "НЕРПЫ" стоят на страже спокойствия и порядка северных рубежей страны в приграничном портовом городе, на берегу одного их северных морей . Они борются со злом во всех его проявлениях. "НЕРПЫ" не только охраняют Северный рубеж государства, но и охотятся за диверсантами, предателями родины, обезвреживают иностранные специальные подразделения. Герои сражаются с контрабандистами и обеспечивают безопасность важных свидетелей. Освобождают заложников, обеспечивают безопасность глубоководных экспедиций и исследований, пресекают попытки уничтожения нефтедобывающей платформы, обезвреживают врагов при попытке дискредитации круглогодичного Северного морского пути и мн. др. В общем, самые сложные, самые опасные и непредсказуемые задания – это то, чем они занимаются изо дня в день.

programme.title: Детективы
programme.desc: Два полицейских в отставке открывают частное детективное агентство... Майоры полиции Игорь Лукин и Алексей Насонов вышли в отставку, но не собираются сидеть без дела. Они открывают частное детективное агентство "Детективы" и берутся за дела тех, кто по разным причинам не хочет обращаться в полицию… Опыт и профессиональные навыки Лукина и Насонова позволяют им с одинаковым успехом и решать семейные конфликты, и раскрывать уголовные преступления.

programme.title: Береговая охрана
programme.desc: рассказывает о жизни пограничного российского городка и непростой службе офицеров Береговой охраны ФСБ РФ. Андрей Васильков по распределению прибывает в Ушаков. Позади – пять лет в военно-морском институте, впереди – служба в береговой охране. Но вместо ожидаемых Васильковым романтики, приключений, опасностей и пороха, он получил каждодневную рутину. А еще – излишнюю самоуверенность, разгильдяйство, предательства, разочарования, настоящую мужскую дружбу, любовь к женщине, подвиги, героизм, взросление… И, как выяснилось, любовь к Родине. Потому что "есть такая профессия – Родину защищать".

programme.title: След

programme.title: Xploration Nature Knows Best
programme.desc: Hosted by marine biologist Danni Washington, this is a fascinating STEM series which focuses on the fun and inventive ways that scientists, engineers and inventors have taken inspiration from Mother Nature's methods in order to develop incredible advancements in their fields. By copying the ways that plants and animals have developed, the human innovators can utilise similar approaches to evolve modern technology for everyday use. From advances such as a new type of glass inspired by spider webs that will stop birds from crashing into it; to tiny robots based on manta rays that are helping to fight heart problems; and creating a new type of camera based on the study of squids.

programme.title: Deadly Nightmares of Nature
programme.desc: Naomi travels the world to find the worst nightmare of nature.

programme.title: The Big Feed
programme.desc: The Big Feed is an educational documentary that looks at all our favourite animals, studying the way that they eat. The show goes behind the scenes of the world's most famous zoos to explore how they perform the gargantuan task of feeding thousands of animals everyday. From big cats to aquatic animals, and panda bears to meerkats, each animal has to be carefully catered for, with consideration to their nutritional needs and taste preferences. The big feed is like trying to feed an entire city everyday.

programme.title: Dick 'N' Dom Go Wild
programme.desc: Dick and Dom get their hands on back-stage passes for willing helpers to get stuck in at Britain's busiest vets, wildlife sanctuaries and animal rescue centres. Their young volunteers are up for a massive challenge but they're not all big animal lovers. Will a day on the frontline looking after wounded wildlife and poorly pets change their minds?

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Re-telling history in a way you never have before, Horrible History shows the dark and gruesome aspects of British and other Western world history. Ranging from the Stone Age to post-World War II era, the show presents the history with several time periods in a single episode, with live action sketches and music videos intercut by animations and quizzes. Starring Matthew Baynton, Simon Farnaby, Martha Howe-Douglas, Jim Howick, Laurence Rickard, Sarah Hadland and Ben Willbond with a large supporting cast, this British children's live-action historical and musical sketch comedy is based on the bestselling books of the same name by Terry Deary, adapted for CBBC. Running from 2009 to 2013, Horrible Histories doesn't set out to educate younger audiences but instead popularise history and inspire curiosity for further investigation into history.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures
programme.desc: In one of the biggest safari parks in the whole world there is Ranger Andy, who will go off in his truest mobile- buggy to fix the problem. He is not alone with help from his Boss, Mr Hammond and Tech superstar Jen who know everything about computer. They are here to help all of the animal from the small and cute to the big and scary that you wouldn't normally get too close to. Everyday there is a new problem that need solving by Andy all around the whole world. Come a long on this epic journey of Adventure and learning about your favourite animal along the way.

programme.title: MathXplosion
programme.desc: Mathemagician' Eric Leclerc shares secrets from the not-so-hidden world of math in this exciting, entertaining math-short series, proving math really is everywhere! In each episode, Eric illuminates the big ideas in primary math that children are already learning to do. From computation, to patterns in a number sequence, to shapes and space, and measurement, mathXplosion highlights how math is related and connected to things they see, know, and wonder about in their daily lives. mathXplosion aims to grow and foster a love of math in a fun, funny, and approachable way!

programme.title: Hey You! What If…
programme.desc: Hey You! What If...is a British children's series with a fun approach to get children interested in science. Each episode answers scientific questions, as the main character goes through impossible situations, with madcap experiments created by visual effects and motion graphics. Anything becomes real in this thought-provoking show, as possibilities of time travel, flat Earth and even a moon made of cheese are explored.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: This is a version of the Great British Bake Off, except in this series, the contestants are all aged between nine and fifteen years. They will compete over 15 episodes, trying to make the best bread, biscuits, and cake, all manner of baked goods, in fact. At the end of the 15 weeks, one of the twenty original contestants will be crowned the winner. But who has got what it takes? Comedian Harry Hill presents, with Liam Charles and Prue Leith as the judges. Each week, there will be a technical test, followed by a "Showstopper" round, in which contestants are encouraged to get creative and create more individual bakes, with little guidelines. In the technical, however, they have to follow a recipe and produce bakes in a more uniform manner.

programme.title: Danger! Wild Animals
programme.desc: Take a safari through the wilderness, visiting wildlife reserves, zoos and exotic locations that are home to some of the world's most interesting and dangerous species. Whether its an ostrich egg hatching or turtle being release into the wild, a rhino being weaned or an elephant being rescued from deadly minefields in Africa, this fast paced series uses some breathe taking footage. If that wasn't enough to capture your interest, it even takes a trip to some of the world's best breeding for conservation programs, encountering some adorable zoo babies.

programme.title: Hero Squad
programme.desc: Six children are transformed into Hero Squad cadets and undergo a rigorous training programme alongside real life-savers. Under the watchful eye of presenter Rav Wilding and closely supervised by experienced mentors, these six wannabe heroes have the experience of a lifetime. In just 48 hours, the Hero Squad cadets have to learn the skills and techniques to cope with a "real life" rescue scenario.

programme.title: Ride or Wrong
programme.desc: Hosted by Emily Agard, Ride or Wrong is an adrenaline-filled series that gets your pulse pounding as teen contestants answer trivia questions while riding extreme amusement park rides. Each episode centres on one unsuspecting teen contestant who has no idea that they are about to be on a quiz show. Once the contestants are securely strapped in and the ride is twisting and turning at extreme speeds, our host poses a variety of trivia questions ranging from pop culture to science. Every correct answer earns our contestants points, which are added up at the end of each ride. Contestants must rely on their intelligence as well as their ability to focus under extreme conditions as they experience some of fastest and tallest rides the amusement park has to offer.

programme.title: We're Talking Animals
programme.desc: We're Talking Animals is a children's television series that provides eye opening and jaw dropping facts about all kinds of wildlife and farm animals. Accompanied by some stunning photography and footage of the animals in question. With hilarious asides from the animals themselves, this animal knowledge is coming straight from the horses mouth. Solidifying everything the episode has taught, MC Spider hosts an informative quiz about each segment the show has covered, finding the answers deep in his trusty web. This interactive extra keeps the show super engaging and fun.

programme.title: All Over The Workplace
programme.desc: All Over The Workplace offers children a unique opportunity to explore what it is really like to do the jobs they dream about when they get older. Whether you want to join the police or write your first novel as an author, or cook sumptuous dishes as a chef, make people laugh as a comedian, wow the crowds as a footballer or even govern the country as a politician, this series sets out to discover just what it takes!

programme.title: Science Max: Experiments at Large
programme.desc: Science Max: Experiments at Large is a Canadian children's TV series, hosted by Phil McCordic. The aim is to educate viewers about science through various experiments and to demonstrate main scientific principles in a fun and entertaining way. There is an interactive online component in the show, kids are welcome to interact with the host and ask him science questions. Kids will find out how gravity works, what polymers are, why boomerangs come back and much more. When it comes to scientific experiments, everything is large, as Phil likes to go bigger to make it more entertaining for the viewers.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures
programme.desc: Time-travelling and educational fun for kids. Andy works at the National Museum where he's responsible for the prehistoric exhibitions. He needs plenty of interesting items for his displays like dinosaur bones, feathers and things. Luckily for Andy, he has a time machine which means he can pop back to the prehistoric era, like the ice-age or the time of the dinosaurs and collect what he needs. Join Andy on his adventures back in time and learn about the creatures and beasts that lived on Earth millions of years ago. Starring Andy Day.

programme.title: Xploration Nature Knows Best
programme.desc: Hosted by marine biologist Danni Washington, this is a fascinating STEM series which focuses on the fun and inventive ways that scientists, engineers and inventors have taken inspiration from Mother Nature's methods in order to develop incredible advancements in their fields. programme.title: SmartMix
programme.desc: The smartest mix of the best music available through the night! Just turn it on!

programme.title: Čempionų kelias. "Vieningoji" krepšinio lyga. Maskvos srities "Khimki" – Masvkos CSKA
Čempionų kelias. Ispanijos Endesa krepšinio lyga. Madrido "Real" – Barselonos "Barca"
Čempionų kelias. Ispanijos Endesa krepšinio lyga. Fuenlabrados "Montakit" – Barselonos "Barca"
Čempionų kelias. "Vieningoji" krepšinio lyga. Maskvos CSKA – Zieliona Guros "Zieliona Gura"
Lietuvos rankinio federacijos (LRF) taurės varžybos. Antrasis moterų pusfinalis
Čempionų kelias. "Vieningoji" krepšinio lyga. Maskvos CSKA – Zieliona Guros "Zieliona Gura"
Grappling LT. Jaunimo čempionatas, Ukmergė, šešta laida
Čempionų kelias. Ispanijos Endesa krepšinio lyga. Fuenlabrados "Montakit" – Barselonos "Barca"
One Championship on TNT I. Mišrių kovos menų čempionatas
Raidījums "Vilciens rīga – Valka. Inqognito"; īsfilma "Liepājas 380 sagaidot"
Ieskats pasākumā "Jūras svētku dziesmu konkurss", atk.
Узкая грань
programme.desc: Т. Уолш. Одинокая молодая женщина Кэрол Ханикат, согласившись на уговоры друзей, мечтавших выдать ее замуж, отправляется на свидание вслепую с адвокатом Майклом Тарлоу, но неожиданно становится единственной свидетельницей его убийства. Узнав из новостей, что Майкл – адвокат знаменитого гангстера Лео Уотса, который и был одним из убийц, женщина понимает, что отныне ее жизнь в опасности.

programme.title: Джокер
programme.desc: Максим Салютов, достойный всяческих похвал молодой человек, на взлете своей карьеры влюбляется в Лелю – девушку не своего круга. Максим собирается с духом, преодолевает робость и, безо всякой надежды, открывает Леле свое сердце. Ура! Она отвечает взаимностью. Невеста согласна, жених тоже согласен. Кажется, счастье близко. Но не тут-то было! Как всегда, вмешиваются родственники – близкие и дальние. Одних не устраивает социальное положение и происхождение жениха. Других все устраивает, но тут оказывается, что у самого Максима завалялся "скелет в шкафу". Скелет готов выпасть на всеобщее обозрение, чему немало способствует Вольдемар – приятель юных лет Максима. Вольдемар и есть тот самый дальний родственник, вступивший на скользкий путь шантажа.

programme.title: Селин и Жюли совсем заврались
programme.desc: Библиотекарша Жюли уважает порядок. Смешная нескладная фокусница Селин вечно что-то роняет, куда-то спешит. Что может быть общего между ними? Волею странного стечения обстоятельств они не просто познакомятся, а станут причудливым "зеркалом" друг друга. И будут сначала поочередно, а потом вместе попадать в "зазеркалье" – в таинственный дом, где изо дня в день разыгрывается одна и та же драма: готовится убийство маленькой девочки. Это дом с фотографии, найденной в сундуке со старыми куклами Жюли. Проникнув в дом, Селин и Жюли должны играть одну и ту же роль — медсестры, ухаживающей за девочкой. И в какой-то момент они решают из пассивных зрителей, наблюдающих за миром призраков, превратиться в активных действующих лиц и вмешаться в ход событий.

programme.title: Магия зверя
programme.desc: В окрестностях альпийской деревушки во время снежной бури исчезает богатая парижанка Эвелин Дюка. К этому таинственному происшествию неожиданным образом оказываются причастны несколько человек: фермер и его жена, страдающая от неразделенной любви молодая официантка, здешний изгой и мошенник-африканец, никогда не покидавший пределы своей родины и заключивший союз с духами зла.

programme.title: Узкая грань
programme.desc: Т. Уолш. Одинокая молодая женщина Кэрол Ханикат, согласившись на уговоры друзей, мечтавших выдать ее замуж, отправляется на свидание вслепую с адвокатом Майклом Тарлоу, но неожиданно становится единственной свидетельницей его убийства. Узнав из новостей, что Майкл – адвокат знаменитого гангстера Лео Уотса, который и был одним из убийц, женщина понимает, что отныне ее жизнь в опасности.

programme.title: Плохие банки
programme.desc: Карьера Яны не задалась с самого начала – ее уволили из солидного банка Люксембурга за небольшую ошибку. Вскоре девушка получает предложение от Габриэля Фенгера, руководителя крупного банка во Франкфурте. Она довольно быстро зарабатывает себе репутацию отличного специалиста, оказываясь одной из самых ценных сотрудниц банка Deutsche Invest. Но беда в том, что финансовая организация, в которой она работала раньше, конкурирует с нынешней, и девушка оказывается целью шантажа бывшего начальника.

programme.title: Земля гангстеров
programme.desc: История Аль Капоне и его правой руки Джека Макмюррея по прозвищу Пулемёт о борьбе с ирландской мафией, возглавляемой Джорджем Мораном по прозвищу Рехнувшийся. Ужасные бандитские бои завершились знаменитой резнёй в День святого Валентина в 1929 году, в результате которой семь человек погибли от пулеметного нападения, которое, как считается, было заказано самим Капоне.

programme.title: 3 счастливых поросенка
programme.desc: Режиссер: Жан-Франсуа Пуле / -Тивьерж, Патрис Робитейлл, Софи Прегент. Реми, Матьё и Кристиан — братья, чья гиперактивность доставляет массу неприятностей им самим, их ревнивым женам и подружкам. Всё только усложняется, когда Доминик, жена Реми, выставляет мужа за дверь и не прочь завести интрижку с его братом...

programme.title: Любовная страсть
programme.desc: 'Обичи, Бернар Жиродо, Жан-Луи Трентиньян, Массимо Джиротти. Молодой и привлекательный Джорджо, капитан кавалерии, влюблен в замужнюю женщину Клару. Но его переводят в другой гарнизон. А там в него влюбляется больная и безобразная девушка Фоска, кузина коменданта. И эта страсть перерастает в одержимость...

programme.title: Рябиновый вальс
programme.desc: Это история о подвиге юных сапёров, которые ценой своей жизни обезвреживали минные поля и дороги. В соответствии с постановлением Госкомитета обороны в 1944-1946 годах на территории Вологодской области проводились работы по разминированию Оштинского района, освобожденного от немцев. Были подготовлены минеры — в основном 17-20-летние девушки. Яркая и короткая любовь главных героев — инструктора Алексея и молодой вдовы с ребенком Полины. Неожиданно возвращается живым с фронта муж Полины Егор. Извещение о его гибели было ошибочным.

programme.title: Плохие банки
programme.desc: Карьера Яны не задалась с самого начала – ее уволили из солидного банка Люксембурга за небольшую ошибку. Вскоре девушка получает предложение от Габриэля Фенгера, руководителя крупного банка во Франкфурте. Она довольно быстро зарабатывает себе репутацию отличного специалиста, оказываясь одной из самых ценных сотрудниц банка Deutsche Invest. Но беда в том, что финансовая организация, в которой она работала раньше, конкурирует с нынешней, и девушка оказывается целью шантажа бывшего начальника.

programme.title: Земля гангстеров
programme.desc: История Аль Капоне и его правой руки Джека Макмюррея по прозвищу Пулемёт о борьбе с ирландской мафией, возглавляемой Джорджем Мораном по прозвищу Рехнувшийся. Ужасные бандитские бои завершились знаменитой резнёй в День святого Валентина в 1929 году, в результате которой семь человек погибли от пулеметного нападения, которое, как считается, было заказано самим Капоне.

Всё только усложняется, когда Доминик, жена Реми, выставляет мужа за дверь и не прочь завести интрижку с его братом...
